::Zardus::

Zardus growls as he hears the replies to his transmission. He makes a mental 
note to give the troops a lesson on following orders...

"No, pink and purple give me a headache," he replies to Scattershot, then 
opening his comm to Dark One, not knowing the other was in the CR chamber.

"Dark One," he says into it, "Your troops are being a bit rebellious. If you 
tell them to get in line, I'll give you 50 extra kilo's of energon next 
payment."

Zardus stands up, knowing that it was a bad deal. But he wasn't in the mood 
for arguing, and 50 kilos didn't look like alot at this point.
